author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 2,32,818 children of below five years of age are estimated to be administered polio drops in this district during the two phases of pulse polio drive to be held on January 17 and February 22.

Nearly 1,971 camps are to be set up to administer the oral vaccines and 7,884 people are to be engaged in this drive. It would be administered at bus stands, railway stations and hotels too.
title: 2.32 lakh children to get polio drops
